strings:
<voice_0x01001787><se_low>*: What is this?
The Council of Elders is in session!
<voice_0x01001788><se_low>*: Ah, if it isn't Chen Mui!

<voice_0x01001789><se_low>*: It is, it is indeed!
Welcome back to the Council, Chen Mui.
<voice_0x0100178A><se_low>Chen Mui: Thank you. But let us save the pleasantries for later. First, tell me how the Sanctuary could have fallen into this state!
<voice_0x0100178B><se_low>*: Ah, yes. I forgot that you left before the ritual was carried out...

<voice_0x0100178C><se_low>*: Very well.
Let me tell you how all this came about.
<voice_0x0100178D><se_low>*: Just after you left, Chen Mui, the Lord of the Dragovians came to a momentous decision.
<voice_0x0100178E><se_low>*: As, of course, you know, we Dragovians are both human and dragon.
<voice_0x0100178F><se_low>*: He decided the time had come for us to abandon our human forms once and for all.

<voice_0x01001790><se_low>Chen Mui: What!? Preposterous!
Does such a ritual really exist!?
<voice_0x01001791><se_low>*: Our Lord ascended the Heavenly Dais to test the ritual on himself first.
<voice_0x01001792><se_low>*: Once it was completed, our Lord became a dragon once and for all...or so he thought.

<voice_0x01001793><se_low>*: In fact, the ritual failed.
As you know, it consumes a great deal of energy for us to remain in our dragon forms.
<voice_0x01001794><se_low>*: The ritual compensated for this by replenishing the energy from the ambient surroundings.
<voice_0x01001795><se_low>*: In other words, our Lord began to absorb the energy of his fellow Dragovians.
<voice_0x01001796><se_low>*: We are slowly being consumed by his unending hunger for energy. Thus the Sanctuary has fallen into discord and disarray.
<voice_0x01001797><se_low>*: As soon as we realised the ritual had failed, we appeared before the Lord of the Dragovians to plead with him to reverse it.
<voice_0x01001798><se_low>*: But the ritual appears to have affected his mind as well. In his current state, he cannot be reasoned with.
<voice_0x01001799><se_low>*: What now sits upon the Heavenly Dais is not the Lord of the Dragovians but a savage, uncontrollable monster.

<voice_0x0100179A><se_low>*: He attacked us.
We had no choice but to withdraw.
<voice_0x0100179B><se_low>*: And soon the Sanctuary of the Dragovians will be no more. I can put it no more plainly than that.
<voice_0x0100179C><se_low>Chen Mui: I see, I see. It appears terrible events have unfolded during my absence...

<voice_0x0100179D><se_low>*: Chen Mui. I meant to ask earlier,
but who are your companions?

<voice_0x0100179E><se_low>*: They appear to be humans, if my eyes
do not deceive me. I mean no rebuke.
I am simply curious.
<voice_0x0100179F><se_low>Chen Mui: Your eyes do not deceive you. <Cap><hero> and these humans intend to confront the Lord of Darkness, Rhapthorne.
<voice_0x010017A0><se_low>*: Indeed? Is <hero>...?
<voice_0x010017A1><se_low>*: There will be time for that later. They plan to confront the Lord of Darkness, you say?
<voice_0x010017A2><se_low>*: If that is the case, they have arrived at a most fortuitous point in our conversation...
<voice_0x010017A3><se_low>*: But can we really entrust such an important task to outsiders?
<voice_0x010017A4><se_low>Chen Mui: Outsiders...? <Cap><hero>, perhaps you should introduce yourselves to the Council of Elders?
